title: Man Supervillain Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A man with a cape and mask, embodying a supervillain persona. This emoji often signifies evil, power, or a dramatic, over-the-top character.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man supervillain emoji presents a figure with a medium-light skin tone exuding an aura of dramatic flair and dark power. His costume is designed with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading, featuring sharp lines softened by rounded edges, and dramatic lighting that casts intriguing shadows. This emoji on Apple devices captures the essence of mischief, menace, or even playful villainy, with a sophisticated, slightly theatrical visual presence.
